name: dogefood-lab
description: DogeFood Lab - Web3 Treat Creation Game

scripts.build: cd frontend && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && npm run build
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && python server.py" "cd frontend && npm start"
scripts.install-all: cd backend && pip install -r requirements.txt && cd ../frontend && npm install --legacy-peer-deps

author: DogeFood Lab Team
